title: Bride divides opinion by wearing a MINION mask on wedding day
text:
A playful bride has divided opinion by wearing a Minion mask down the aisle.

The bride, believed to be from the US, wore the enormous head piece depicting the Despicable Me character along with a beautiful white princess dress for her big day.

An image of the anonymous woman was shared to Facebook group That's It I'm Wedding Shaming, last Thursday, sparking a heated debate and racking up hundreds of comments and 500 'likes'.

Fans of the quirky touch hailed the mask 'genius' but critics claimed it is 'just sad'.

A daring bride has divided opinions online after wearing an enormous minion mask down the aisle (pictured)

One fan wrote: 'Girl! You should of went total minion!'

Another joked: 'Perfect for when you get that huge zit the morning of your wedding.'

A third said: 'I expect nothing less if we get married,' before tagging her partner. While one internet user wrote: 'This is exceptional.'

Social media users were left in disbelief, with the post being inundated with hundreds of comments and nearly 5,000 likes. Some (pictured) said how much they loved the idea

Yet others branded the move 'sad' and suggested the bride's ensemble was a 'nightmare'.

'Anyone else really just find this sad?', one person asked as another unimpressed person added: 'This is legit my worst nightmare.'

'I like minions but this is going too far for me,' a third admitted, while one individual suggested: 'Dude could be marrying someone else for all he knows.'
description: The bride, believed to be from the US, wore the enormous head piece depicting the Despicable Me character along with a beautiful white princess dress for her big day.
